game.name: Corsair`s Madness
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: As the captain of the pirate ship Sam, you'll dive into the adventure of a mystical archipelago brimming with secrets and treasures. Utilize your pirate skills and ancient artifacts to rescue your crew members scattered across various islands and uncover the dark secrets of a mysterious temple.
